markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Feat](/Rules.aspx?ID=26)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 12 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A feat is an ability you can select for your character due to their ancestry, background, class, general training, or skill training. Some feats grant the ability to use special actions.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Feat
